body: Hello World. This is Z-Type clone. Spaceship ready. Meteors approaching. Be careful. Protect our language. Umbrella, flower, insect, tree, mountain, hill, river, stream, lake, sea, ocean, continent, country, city, town, village, neighborhood, street, avenue, boulevard.

Target Alpha Beta Gamma Delta Epsilon Zeta Eta Theta Iota Kappa Lambda Mu Nu Xi Omicron Pi Rho Sigma Tau Upsilon Phi Chi Psi Omega. System failure imminent. Reboot sequence initiated. Uploading virus signature. Firewall breach detected. Security protocols engaged. Lockdown in progress.

Authorization code required. Access denied. Override enabled. Manual control active. Navigation systems offline. Life support critical. Oxygen levels low. Emergency power on. Hull integrity compromised. Shield generator failing. Warp drive unstable.

Hyperjump calculated. Destination unknown. Godspeed commander. Galaxy under threat. Star systems falling one by one. Resistance weakening. Our last hope is you. Ignite engines. Set shields to full capacity.
